jeffgriffiths.dev

Nov 2021: created this website as a means of practicing as I learn Web Development; it also stands a an interactive CV and portfolio

Skills

    • I recognize these are simple use cases, and the data in each collection won't change regularly-- to simplify, I might save data as static JSON files in the future that my server can serve directly

Evolution

I built this website in three main iterations as I went through two Udemy courses: "The Complete Web Development Bootcamp" -Dr. Angela Yu and "MERN Stack Front to Back" -Brad Traversy.

Iteration 1: front end only-- static HTML, Bootstrap, with some functionality through Javascript/JQuery

Iteration 2: backend using Node and Exress with front end similar to first iteration, but rendered by an EJS engine

Iteration 3: MERN stack with a theme building exercise using plain HTML and Sass
